name: Gemmy
description: Fanatical and greedy gourmet Gemmy. She wants to taste all flavors in the world. Even as a vampire, she adheres to her fine dining aesthetics.

passiveSkill.name: Hunting Time
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Gemmy dies, she revives and receives 100% ATK, 100% DEF, 1% HP, and 1000 Rage. Triggers 2 times per battle, the second time inheriting 50% ATK."}

uniqueSkill.name: Cross Feast
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Gemmy deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target, plus an additional DMG equal to 12% of the target's current HP. The additional DMG does not exceed 300% ATK."}

specialSkill.name: Bloody Slice
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Gemmy deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target and randomly increases one allied partner's Lifesteal Rate by 30%. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack. Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Shape It
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Gemmy deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target, plus an additional DMG equal to 17% of the target's current HP. The additional DMG does not exceed 400% ATK.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Gemmy dies, she revives and receives 100% ATK, 100% DEF, 1% HP, and 1000 Rage. Triggers 2 times per battle, the second time inheriting 50% ATK.
templateData.lens6.skill: Gemmy deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target and randomly increases one allied partner's Lifesteal Rate by 30%. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack. Cast Rate: {placeholder}
